title: Buildings intended for hazardous godowns, storage of inflammable materials or storage of explosives shall be single-storeyed structures only
clause_text: Buildings intended for hazardous godowns, storage of inflammable materials or storage of explosives shall be single-storeyed structures only.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Buildings intended for hazardous godowns, storage of inflammable materials or storage of explosives shall be single-storeyed structures only.
